name: HEXATTACK!
description:
Your hexagons are under attack! Do you have what it takes to hold off the invading hordes while your hexes escape off-world?

Instructions:

  • Gamepad suggested, but keyboard is supported.
  • Primary button activates your weapon / wall building.
  • Bigger attacks take longer to charge up.
  • Without a charge, you can still build walls to hold off enemies.
  • Destroy all the enemies or survive until your green hexes evacuate!
  • Multiple levels. Go for a high score at the end!
